The Company
We are three people with different backgrounds who want to run a company where all involved people develop and have fun. We want to realize the ideas that people go around carrying. We have already experienced how many good ideas exist. But often the people who have the ideas cannot implement them in practice. The reason may be that you already have a full-time job, that there are no financial resources, that you do not have all the knowledge needed. That you do not want to take the risk. That you don't have time.

We have 40 years of expertise in software development. We have extensive experience in project management and entrepreneurship. We maintain and develop a large network of competencies within many professional groups. The company currently has no employees. We currently put together the teams that are needed for each individual application. The basic thing is that it should be fun and rewarding to work with us.
Our mission
To develop, finance and operate your ideas. Sharing profits with you. We want to carry the whole chain with or without you. We want to create specifications, develop, publish, operate, maintain, further develop and manage help for users.
Objective
To hold a well-stocked portfolio of applications that we operate. Those who are with us along the way there will be well rewarded. We also want to become the future employer who understands the importance of well-being, have fun at work, real creativity and what is really a good workplace. All this is possible when we operate several applications. The goal is to be able to offer, for example, a 16-week paid holiday.
SAM
